Wind.Description: Wind can be used to generate electricity through wind turbines, which is a form of renewable energy.
Wind power is harnessed by wind turbines to generate electricity.
Wind energy can be harnessed using kites, which can generate electricity or perform other tasks.
Weather vanes are used to determine wind direction, which is important for meteorological purposes.
